org.research_software.citation.cff.model

Interface SoftwareCitationMetadata


  • public interface SoftwareCitationMetadata
    A set of software citation metadata for a specific software.
    Version:
    Citation File Format Version 1.0.3
    Author:
    Stephan Druskat <[mail@sdruskat.net](mailto:mail@sdruskat.net)>
    See Also:
    https://citation-file-format.github.io/1.0.3/specifications/#/entity-objects

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getCffVersion

        String getCffVersion()
        Returns:
        The version of CFF used to represent the software citation metadata

      • getMessage

        String getMessage()
        Returns:
        The message pertaining to the use of the software citation metadata

      • getTitle

        String getTitle()
        Returns:
        The title of the software

      • getVersion

        String getVersion()
        Returns:
        The exact version of the software

      • getDoi

        String getDoi()
        Returns:
        The DOI of the software version

      • getDateReleased

        java.time.LocalDate getDateReleased()
        Returns:
        The release date of the software version

      • convertAndSetDateReleased

        void convertAndSetDateReleased(String dateReleasedString)
                        throws InvalidDataException
        Converts the passed date string into a LocalDate object via LocalDate.parse(CharSequence). If an exception is caught, it is wrapped into an InvalidDataException, which is then thrown instead.
        Parameters:
        dateReleasedString - The value string for the field `date-released`
        Throws:
        InvalidDataException - on catching a DateTimeParseException

      • getAbstract

        String getAbstract()
        Returns:
        An abstract or description of the software version

      • getCommit

        String getCommit()
        Returns:
        A commit hash or revision number for the version of the software

      • getKeywords

        List<String> getKeywords()
        Returns:
        A list of keywords pertaining to the software version

      • getLicense

        String getLicense()
        Returns:
        The [SPDX short license identifier](https://spdx.org/licenses/)for the license under which the software version has been published

      • getLicenseUrl

        URL getLicenseUrl()
        Returns:
        The URL pointing to the license text if the license is not included in the [SPDX License list](https://spdx.org/licenses/)

      • convertAndSetLicenseUrl

        void convertAndSetLicenseUrl(String licenseUrlString)
                      throws InvalidDataException
        Converts the passed URL string into a URL object. If an exception is caught, it is wrapped into an InvalidDataException, which is then thrown instead.
        Parameters:
        licenseUrlString - The value string for the field `license-url`
        Throws:
        InvalidDataException - on catching a MalformedURLException

      • getRepository

        URL getRepository()
        Returns:
        The URL of the repository for the software version

      • convertAndSetRepository

        void convertAndSetRepository(String repositoryString)
                      throws InvalidDataException
        Converts the passed URL string into a URL object. If an exception is caught, it is wrapped into an InvalidDataException, which is then thrown instead.
        Parameters:
        repositoryString - The value string for the field `repository`
        Throws:
        InvalidDataException - on catching a MalformedURLException

      • getRepositoryCode

        URL getRepositoryCode()
        Returns:
        The URL of the source code repository for the software version

      • convertAndSetRepositoryCode

        void convertAndSetRepositoryCode(String repositoryCodeString)
                          throws InvalidDataException
        Converts the passed URL string into a URL object. If an exception is caught, it is wrapped into an InvalidDataException, which is then thrown instead.
        Parameters:
        repositoryCodeString - The value string for the field `repository-code`
        Throws:
        InvalidDataException - on catching a MalformedURLException

      • getRepositoryArtifact

        URL getRepositoryArtifact()
        Returns:
        The URL of the artifact repository for the software version

      • convertAndSetRepositoryArtifact

        void convertAndSetRepositoryArtifact(String repositoryArtifactString)
                              throws InvalidDataException
        Converts the passed URL string into a URL object. If an exception is caught, it is wrapped into an InvalidDataException, which is then thrown instead.
        Parameters:
        repositoryArtifactString - The value string for the field `repository-artifact`
        Throws:
        InvalidDataException - on catching a MalformedURLException

      • getUrl

        URL getUrl()
        Returns:
        The URL of the software version landing page or website

      • getAuthors

        List<Subject> getAuthors()
        Returns:
        A list of authors of the software version

      • getPersonAuthors

        List<Person> getPersonAuthors()
        Returns:
        A filtered list of authors of the software version, containing only those of type Person

      • getEntityAuthors

        List<Entity> getEntityAuthors()
        Returns:
        A filtered list of authors of the software version, containing only those of type Entity

      • getContacts

        List<Subject> getContacts()
        Returns:
        A list of contacts for the software version

      • getPersonContacts

        List<Person> getPersonContacts()
        Returns:
        A filtered list of contacts of the software version, containing only those of type Person

      • getEntityContacts

        List<Entity> getEntityContacts()
        Returns:
        A filtered list of contacts of the software version, containing only those of type Entity

      • getReferences

        List<Reference> getReferences()
        Returns:
        A list of additional references for the software version, e.g, software papers, or papers describing concepts or algorithms implemented in the software version
